function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Changes in water demand and citizen behavior due to pandemic","Impact":"Stress on the water system and risk to financial sustainability of water utilities and workplace","Mitigation":"Implement measures to increase resilience of the existing system and consider new infrastructures","Technologies":"Resilience planning, infrastructure development","People":"Water utilities, workplace","Owner":"Water utilities, urban planners"},{"Description":"Relaxing environmental regulations to mitigate economic crisis","Impact":"Potential impact on water quality and treatment costs","Mitigation":"Ensuring compliance with environmental regulations, implementing sustainable economic measures","Technologies":"Monitoring technologies, sustainable industrial practices","People":"Environmental regulatory agencies, industrial stakeholders","Owner":"Environmental regulatory agencies, industrial stakeholders"},{"Description":"Reduction of commercial and industrial activity leading to changes in water discharges","Impact":"Compensation for potential effects on receiving water bodies, but potential increase in treatment costs if impacted water bodies are potable sources","Mitigation":"Implement sustainable industrial practices, monitor and treat water discharges","Technologies":"Monitoring technologies, water treatment technologies","People":"Industrial stakeholders, water treatment facilities","Owner":"Industrial stakeholders, water treatment facilities"}]}
